General.Name: JBM Auto Limited
General.Description: JBM Auto Limited manufactures and sells sheet metal components, tools, dies and moulds, and buses in India and internationally. It operates through three segments: Sheet Metal Components, Assemblies & Sub-assemblies (Component Division); Tool, Dies & Moulds (Tool Room Division); and OEM Division. The company offers auto components, systems, and assemblies, such as BIW parts, including cross car beams; chassis and suspension systems; skin panels; tools and dies for turnkey projects; li-ion batteries and electric vehicles (EV); and pedal boxes, tubular products, and safety critical components and assemblies. It also designs, develops, manufactures, assembles, and sells CNG, diesel, and buses, as well as parts, accessories, and maintenance contracts. In addition, the company is involved in the solar power generation activities; and operates EV charging sites. JBM Auto Limited was incorporated in 1996 and is headquartered in Gurugram, India.
